document.name: Batch PURLs Accessor

functionality.item: Accept a batch PURL-related form (from a RESTful API where available commands are 'create, modify, validate') via a matching HTTP verb (POST, PUT) and takes appropriate action. This script is a state machine.
Return a confirmation page as appropriate.
Return an error page on error.

document.assumptions: This is a NetKernel Accessor. It is served by a NetKernel and is URL addressable. It is a dynamic script.
document.preconditions: Expects a form appropriate to the calling HTTP verb.
document.postconditions: The requested action has been completed unless an error is reported.

linksto.parentof: Dynamically generated error page (on error condition).
